titleStmt.title: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i ti ka chen po legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer
titleStmt.author: chu mig pa seng ge dpal

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Last folio number: 152. Missing folios: 12 and 13. Last folio broken in two halves, which were stitched together.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
tshad ma rnaM nges kyi ti ka¶
************
** ***kyi (tshad ma?) tik chung bzhugs
4¶ (149)>
lo tsha ba gzhung mdzes pa bskyed pa de kho na dgos 'brel ngag gi dgos pa yin zer ro ||

lo tsha ba ni brjod bya bstan pas dgos med kyi log rtog sel zer ro || dgos med kyi log rtog bsal ba'i don du dgos pa dngos su brjod pa don med du thal lo || 'dod na 'bras bu med par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir dgos pa brjod do || ces so ||

chos kyi seng ge ni|_rdzas rgyun de nyid dang rgyun gzhan la phan 'dogs [\[p.54-7\]]pa de mtshan nyid yin no zhe na|_nor bu me shel dang chu shel de mi mchu la ltos te nyer len gyi rgyu ma yin par thal|_mtshan nyid de med pa'i phyir ro ||

| (PVin 2.1b)_zhes pa'i tshul gsum po de gang zhe na|_tshul gsum po'i ya gyal phyogs chos de ni rtags chos can rjes su dpag bya la yod par nges pa'o || ya gyal rtags kyi rjes 'gro'i [\[p.92-9\]43b9]khyab pa de ni rtags chos can de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod tu mtshungs pa nyid la yang yod par nges pa'o || dang ni tshigs bcad la ma shong ba yin la|_nyid ni lo tsha ba'i 'gyur la chad pa yin te |_dz+nya na shri'i 'gyur las |_rjes dpag bya dang de mthun la|_yod dang med nyid la med par|_nges pa|_ces 'byung ngo ||
lo tsha ba'i 'gyur la chad pa yin te|_dz+nya na shri'i 'gyur las | rjes dpag bya dang de mthun la | yod dang med nyid la med par|_nges pa|_ces 'byung ngo ||
paN Di phal che ba ni rtags gnyis po de rtags btags pa ba yin par 'dod pa yin te|_dz+nya na shri'i [\[]ti ka[;]TIk+ka [\]] las 'bras bu dang rang bzhin du btags pa ba dag gi dbye bas zhes so ||
bod thams cad ni [\[p.197-1\]]97a1 dang po rtags btags pa ba yin la|_gnyis pa rtags mtshan nyid pa yin par 'dod do ||

lo tsha ba'i ti ka las yid ches bsal pa la 2 te | khas blangs rang tshig tha dad du 'dod pa dang | tha mi dad du 'dod pa'i phyogs 2
su yod do || dang po ni gzhan phyogs yin la 2 pa ni rang phyogs yin no || zhes de yan chad gzhan gyi phyogs su 'chad do ||

bdag nyid chen po'i gzhung don ji bzhin 'chad pas gzhan gyi the tshom gcod || rang rgyud thal 'gyur gtan tshigs rnam par dag pas nus pa shin du che || tshig don legs par 'phrod cing snga phyi 'brel pas 'jug ngogs shin du bde' || de ltar chos gsum tshang ba legs par bshad pa bstan pa'i 'od zer yin || mi 'pham mgon dang klu lasla dbang bsgyur dang || phyogs
las rgyal dang rnam 'grel mdzad pa ste || kun kyi legs bshad 'dzin pa chu mig pas || chen po'i pho brang dge ba'i gnas su sbyar || legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer kun du 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyang || nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa stug po rab bcom ste || ji ltar ji snyed shes bya'i don kun
blo yi mig gis legs mthong nas || spangs dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog || gangs can 'dir 'ongs gzhung °° lugs 'di 'chad 'di yi don || legs par bshad dang ma bshad log
par bshad pa'i don || thams cad len 'chad 'dor la 'gal zlos med phyir 'di || blo ldan legs bshad don gnyer kun gyis blang bar rigs || dpal ldan grags pa'i gzhung don blta bar 'dod pa gzhan gyi blo || sprin tshogs stug pos bsgribs pa'i mkha' la nyi ma blta ba bzhin |
bdag gi blo gros dri ma med pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i dbus || rnam par nges don nyi many°°'i dkyil 'khor skyon med rab tu gsal || ||

rgya shes rab dbang phyug dang 'jang shag kya dpal
dang rkyel grags pa seng ge las sogs pa chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs te mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang | slob dpon chos mchog gis mdzad pa'i ti ka 'thad ldan dang | kha che dz+nya na shri'i ti ka lasogs pa mthong ba'i don | bsams
pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'i don ston par byed pa | blo la zin pa tsam gyis mkhas pa'i mchog du 'gyur zhing mkhas pa rtag tu mi nyams par byed pa'i ti ka chen po 'di | shag kya'i dge slong gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal gyis gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag
khang du brtsams te ya°yar lungs khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang du yi ger bkod pa'o || rdzogs s+ho || bkra' shis so || || dge'o || zhus so ||
